name: Caverns of Krostorus+ 1.0
description:
Caverns of Krostorus+ 1.0

Oficial site (Spanish): Caverns of Krostorus+

CAVERNS OF KROSTORUS+ is an improved version of the CAVERNS OF KROSTORUS video game, which contains new graphics and a new level of difficulty titled "INSANE".

Objective:

Escape the Caverns of Krostorus with your Jet avoiding obstacles and getting the energy in your way.

Platform:

  • Microsoft Windows XP or higher.
Characteristics


General characteristics
  • Software completely in English.
  • Minimalist appearance based on text terminals.
  • 2 graphics options available:

    • Original graphics:

      • Original characters
      • Slight aesthetic improvement -> Exclusive to this version
      • Monochromatic screen in green color.

    • New graphics -> Exclusive of this version

      • New ANSI characters
      • Multicolor display

  • It does not require an Internet connection.
  • Without advertising.


Specific characteristics
  • 40 Caverns to overcome.
  • Demo mode.
  • Game for single player.
  • Four selectable difficulty levels before starting the game:

    • EASY
    • NORMAL
    • HARD
    • INSANE -> Exclusive of this version

  • HIGH SCORE automatic save.
  • Sounds.
  • Possibility to save the configuration options -> Exclusive of this version.
  • Instructions.
Notes
  • The application supports a window mode and 4 full-screen modes that can be changed. The order and description of each one is described below:

  1. Window mode.
  2. Full screen with extended appearance without edge smoothing.
  3. Full screen with extended aspect with edge smoothing.
  4. Full screen with original appearance without edge smoothing.
  5. Full screen with original appearance with edge smoothing.
  • New graphics option disabled by default.

Installation instructions
  1. Download the installation package called "Caverns of Krostorus+ 1.0.exe".
  2. Run the installation package.
  3. Press the button with the description "Extract".
